attributes.action: Debate the issues raised by the 'Occupy London Stock Exchange' movement
attributes.additional_details:
The Occupy movement has swept the globe. Many support its message even though they are unable to participate. It is important for the stability of the British democracy that the key issues are addressed before the severe austerity measures begin.

Parliament to debate the key complaints and demands of the Occupy movement, how they can best be resolved by politicians and the consequences of ignoring them
